plugins.name: Screenshot to 100%
plugins.description:
The plugin quickly scales selected images to 100% of their real screenshot size in one click.


On Windows, if your display scaling (for example, 175%) is set above 100%, screenshots are captured at a larger size and look incorrect when pasted into Figma. This plugin helps you downscale screenshots so they appear correctly in Figma.


To use the plugin properly, set the same scale value in the plugin settings as in your Windows display settings.

plugins.name: MoroccanMock
plugins.description:
Design layouts more efficiently by pulling text strings, images, and cultural assets from a unique Moroccan-inspired palette. "moroccanMock" lets you create custom Moroccan-themed content and share it with other Figma users. Collaboration has never been easier!


Content:

Browse or search content to find a collection of Moroccan-inspired text strings, images, and icons. Struggling to find the perfect content? You can create your own text and image assets by using Add.


Add:

Create text categories and populate them with your own text strings. You can also upload up to 20 PNGs or JPEGs to create image content. As a creator, you may choose to share it publicly or keep it private. When you create content, it is automatically pinned to the Home Screen for quick access (signed-in users only).


Customize Your Home Screen:

Optimize your workflow by pinning the content that you use most to your home screen. Apply 1-click access to any content type with the switch of a toggle (signed-in users only). Drag and drop items on your home screen to suit your preferences.


How to use moroccanMock:

Find content:

Access saved content from your Home Screen or navigate through the tabs to search or browse content. Pin it for ease of access to your home screen.


Applying text content:

Select one or more text layers in your design to apply strings individually or apply them all. Use the original order provided or choose an order from the drop-down menu.


Applying image content:

Select one or more image layers or frames in your design, then apply the images individually or apply them all in random order.


Applying icon content:

Browse the collection or use the search bar to find a Moroccan icon. Click on the icon or drag and drop it into your design. You can also adjust the icon size to scale as needed.


Creating text and image content:

Navigate to the Add tab, click Add, and select content type. Provide a Title relevant to your content. Set your content to Public or Private. See the terms and conditions regarding usage and rights.


Anwar Bahou

LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/bahouanwar
plugins.tagline: Bring Moroccan Culture to Your Designs – Instantly

plugins.name: ExportEase
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma design tokens into clean, organized code files that developers will love.

ExportEase bridges the gap between design and development by intelligently exporting your Figma variables and styles to 6 professional formats: CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, JSON, Dart, and Tailwind CSS.

🎯 Why ExportEase?

Smart Organization: Automatically creates separate files for each collection and mode (perfect for light/dark themes). No more messy, mixed token files.

Professional Output: Advanced sorting algorithm handles complex naming patterns - from simple numbering to semantic scales (xs, sm, md, lg, xl).

Developer-Ready: Generates production-quality code with proper formatting, comments, and import instructions. Variables are correctly formatted with fallbacks and references.

Effortless Workflow: One-click exports with ZIP downloads containing organized files and a helpful README with import instructions.

Multiple Formats for Every Stack:

CSS Custom Properties for modern web

SCSS Variables for preprocessing workflows

JavaScript ES6 modules with TypeScript support

JSON for any platform or documentation

Dart constants for Flutter development

Tailwind CSS config extensions ready to use

Perfect for:

✨ Design systems teams maintaining consistent tokens

✨ Developers who need clean, organized design token files

✨ Projects with multiple themes or brands

✨ Teams working across web, mobile, and Flutter platforms

The Result: Instead of manually copying variables or getting messy exports, you get perfectly organized, developer-friendly files that respect your Figma structure and naming conventions.

Export once, use everywhere. Your design tokens, exactly how your developers want them.
plugins.tagline: Transform design tokens into developer-ready code

139997.release_notes:
# 🚀 ExportEase - Advanced Design Token Exporter

## Transform Your Figma Variables into Production-Ready Code

**ExportEase** is the most comprehensive design token export plugin for Figma, enabling seamless integration between design and development workflows. Export your Figma variables and styles to multiple code formats with just a few clicks.

---

## ✨ **What's New in This Update**

### 🎯 **Direct Download Feature**
- **Skip the preview, get your files instantly!** New direct download option bypasses the preview step
- Click "Download Selected Files" and get your tokens immediately as individual files or ZIP archives
- Perfect for CI/CD workflows and rapid prototyping

### 🔧 **Enhanced Export Experience**
- **Smart file organization** - automatically groups exports by collections and modes
- **Comprehensive error handling** with detailed debugging information
- **Improved state management** - no more stuck buttons or broken workflows
- **Better performance** with optimized token collection and analysis

---

## 🎨 **Core Features**

### **📦 Multiple Export Formats**
- **CSS Custom Properties** - Perfect for modern web applications
- **Tailwind Config** - Ready-to-use Tailwind CSS theme configuration
- **JavaScript/TypeScript** - Import tokens directly into your JS/TS projects

### **🎛️ Flexible Export Options**
- **Variables Export** - Convert Figma variables (colors, spacing, typography, etc.)
- **Styles Export** - Export paint styles, text styles, and effect styles
- **Selective Export** - Choose exactly which files and collections you need
- **Batch Export** - Export all collections and modes in one ZIP file

### **🏗️ Smart Organization**
- **Collection-based grouping** - Each variable collection becomes a separate file
- **Mode support** - Light/dark themes, responsive breakpoints, brand variations
- **Intelligent naming** - Converts Figma names to valid CSS/JS variable names
- **Conflict resolution** - Handles duplicate names and edge cases gracefully

---

## 🛠️ **Perfect For**

### **👩‍💻 Developers**
- Eliminate manual token copying and reduce errors
- Get production-ready code that integrates seamlessly
- Support for modern frameworks (React, Vue, Angular, etc.)
- Compatible with design system tools and component libraries

### **🎨 Designers**
- Maintain design-development consistency automatically
- Share design decisions as usable code
- Streamline handoff process with developers
- Support complex design systems with multiple themes

### **🏢 Teams**
- Establish single source of truth for design tokens
- Scale design systems across multiple products
- Reduce design-development friction and iteration time
- Enable design system governance and consistency

---

## 🚀 **How It Works**

1. **📊 Analyze** - Plugin automatically detects your variables and styles
2. **🎯 Select** - Choose your export format (CSS, Tailwind, or JS)
3. **📁 Pick Files** - Select which collections and modes to export
4. **⬇️ Download** - Get your files instantly or preview before download

---

## 💡 **Use Cases**

### **🌙 Theme Systems**
Export light/dark mode variables as separate CSS files or combined Tailwind config

### **📱 Responsive Design**
Convert breakpoint-specific spacing and typography scales to code

### **🎨 Brand Systems**
Export brand-specific color palettes and typography for multi-brand applications

### **🧩 Component Libraries**
Generate design tokens for React, Vue, or Angular component libraries

### **📖 Documentation**
Create token documentation and style guides automatically

---

## 🔧 **Technical Specifications**

- **🔗 Zero Dependencies** - Works entirely within Figma, no external services
- **📦 Multiple Output Formats** - CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS
- **🗂️ Smart File Organization** - Collection and mode-based structure
- **🛡️ Error Handling** - Comprehensive validation and user-friendly error messages
- **⚡ Performance Optimized** - Handles large design systems efficiently
- **🔄 Backward Compatible** - Works with existing Figma variable structures

---

plugins.name: Contrast Checker Pro
plugins.description:
🎨 Advanced Contrast Checker


🎨 Advanced Contrast Checker – Smart Contrast Analysis for Accessible Design


Take your design’s accessibility to the next level.


Advanced Contrast Checker: is a plugin built to detect and analyze contrast issues, even in complex scenarios like elements with **image backgrounds**.


🧠 Key Features:


1. 🎯 Accurate Detection


  1. Automatically identifies when an element has an **image as a background.
  2. Checks the layer hierarchy, scanning parent elements if necessary.


2. 📢 Clear and Visual Feedback


  1. Displays a prominent message when an image background is detected.
  2. Indicates that the contrast ratio is an approximation, offering a helpful reference.
  3. Includes visual icons for better clarity and user understanding.


3. 🌍 Multilingual Support


  1. Available in English, Spanish, and Chinese.
  2. Automatically switches language based on your Figma settings.


4. 🤖 Intelligent Behavior


  1. No color suggestions are shown when the background is an image.
  2. Uses a light gray approximation** to estimate contrast without misleading results.



Designed for creators who care about building **visually inclusive and accessible interfaces**, without compromising on precision or speed.


With 🎨 Advanced Contrast Checker accessibility becomes a natural part of your design workflow.

plugins.name: adamantium token lab - analyze, organize & export tokens
plugins.description:
adamantium token lab

Your ultimate Figma Variables exporter & manager to rule your tokens.


Stop manually transcribing design tokens! adamantium token lab bridges the gap between your Figma Variables and your codebase, streamlining your design-to-development workflow with unparalleled power and flexibility.


Whether you're working with a simple project or a complex multi-library design system, adamantium token lab gives you the tools to view, manage, analyze, and export your design tokens exactly how you need them. Say goodbye to errors, inconsistencies, and wasted time.


Why You Need adamantium token lab:

  1. Bridge the Design-Dev Gap: Seamlessly translate your Figma Variables into production-ready code.
  2. Ensure Consistency: Maintain a single source of truth for your design tokens across all projects.
  3. Boost Efficiency: Automate token exports, saving hours and reducing manual errors.
  4. Unmatched Customization: Tailor token output to perfectly match your team's coding standards.
  5. Maintain a Clean Design System: Understand token usage, identify unused variables, and keep your system tidy.
  6. Empower Collaboration: Provide developers with exactly what they need, in their preferred format.
  7. Handle Complexity with Ease: Advanced features like comprehensive library alias resolution simplify managing large-scale design systems.



Core Features:

Token Viewing & Management:

  1. View all Figma Variables (colors, numbers, strings, booleans) in a dynamic, resizable table.
  2. See token names, descriptions, types, and values per mode at a glance.
  3. Toggle in-table alias resolution to see actual values directly.
  4. Customize the display format for color values (HEX, RGBA, HSLA, etc.) in the table.
  5. Easily filter and view tokens from specific collections.


Powerful & Highly Customizable Export Engine:

  1. Export to CSS Custom Properties.
  2. Export to SASS Variables ($var).
  3. Export to SASS Maps (Nested or Flat options available).
  4. Export to JSON (Structured or Nested, with options for flat key paths).
  5. Export a developer-friendly Intermediate Representation (IR) for custom workflows.
  6. Apply naming conventions: camelCase, PascalCase, kebab-case, snake_case, and more.
  7. Add custom prefixes and suffixes to token names or filenames.
  8. Define custom path separators for token names (e.g., -, _, .).
  9. Output colors in various formats: HEX, HEX8, RGB(A), HSL(A), HSB(A).
  10. Configure numeric units (px, rem, em, pt) and base font size for rem/em.
  11. Choose your alias strategy: embed resolved values or reference original variables/map keys.
  12. Optionally include collection and mode names in exported variable names.
  13. Include token descriptions as comments in your exported code.
  14. Output JSON color values as strings or structured objects.
  15. Customize CSS mode selector templates (e.g., :root[data-theme="$MODE"]).
  16. See an instant live preview of your export with syntax highlighting.
  17. Download generated token files easily.


Advanced Token Usage Analysis:

  1. Identify which design tokens are actively used in your Figma designs.
  2. Analyze token usage on the "Current Page" or across the "Entire File".
  3. View a "Used" column in the token table for clear visual indicators.
  4. See updated collection counts showing (used / total) tokens after analysis.
  5. View a prominent banner confirming the scope and results of the last analysis.
  6. Filter the token list to show "All," "Used," or "Unused" tokens.


Deep Library Integration (All Features Currently Enabled):

  1. Effortlessly work with variables from your enabled Figma libraries.
  2. See clear indicators for the source library of your collections, including the library name where available.
  3. Includes powerful, deep alias resolution across external libraries – essential for complex design systems, ensuring your exported values are always accurate.
  4. The UI intuitively displays information about library-linked aliases with distinct styling, providing full clarity in your token management.


Get Started with adamantium token lab Today!

Take control of your design tokens, accelerate your development process, and ensure unparalleled consistency across your projects. Install adamantium token lab and transform your Figma Variables workflow!



🌱 This is a Beta Version!

adamantium token lab is currently in active development and is being released as a Beta version. This means that while we've worked hard to make it powerful and stable, you might encounter occasional bugs or quirks.


Your Feedback is Gold! 🪙

We are incredibly passionate about making adamantium token lab the best token management tool for you, and your experience and insights are crucial to this journey. As you use the plugin, please help us improve by:


  1. Reporting any bugs or issues you encounter.
  2. Sharing your feature requests and ideas for new functionality.
  3. Letting us know what you love and what could be even better.


Your feedback will directly shape the future of adamantium token lab, helping us to squash bugs, refine features, and build the ultimate token workflow tool. We're committed to regular updates and improvements based on your input.
plugins.tagline: analyze, organize, name, export, cleanup. One token lab to rule your tokens (figma variables).

plugins.name: AI Alt Text Generator
plugins.description:
# Figma Plugin: AI Alt Text Generator


AI Alt Text Generatorは、Figma上で選択した画像に対してGoogle GeminiまたはOpenAIのAIを使い、アクセシブルな代替テキスト（altテキスト）を自動生成するFigmaプラグインです。


---


## 機能概要

- **Gemini（Google）またはOpenAI Vision API**を利用し、画像内容に応じたaltテキストを自動生成

- **日本語・英語のUI/プロンプト切り替え**（画面右上のボタンで即時反映）

- **APIキーはFigmaのclientStorageに安全に保存**

- **複数候補（1～5件）を一度に生成し、編集・選択可能**

- **キーワード指定**で生成内容をカスタマイズ

- **画像プレビュー**とステータス表示

- **エラー時の明確なフィードバック**


---


## セットアップ

1. プラグインをFigmaにインストールします。

2. [Google Gemini APIキー](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) または [OpenAI APIキー](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys) を取得します。

3. プラグインを起動し、設定タブでAPIキーを入力・保存してください。


---


## 使い方

1. **Figmaキャンバス上で画像ノードを選択**

2. 「Altテキスト生成」タブで「画像を解析」ボタンをクリック

3. 画像プレビューとサイズが表示されます

4. 必要に応じてキーワード（日本語は読点「、」区切り、英語はカンマ区切り）や候補数を指定

5. 「代替テキストを生成する」ボタンをクリック

6. 候補リストが表示され、各候補は編集可能

7. 必要に応じて内容をコピーし、プロジェクトの代替テキスト欄等に貼り付けてご利用ください


---


## 言語切り替え

- 画面右上の「日本語 | English」ボタンでUI・プロンプト・説明文が即座に切り替わります。


---


## APIキーについて

- GeminiまたはOpenAIのAPIキーが必要です（どちらか一方でも可。両方入力時はGeminiが優先されます）

- APIキーはFigmaのclientStorageに安全に保存されます

- 無料枠や利用制限については各サービスの公式情報をご確認ください


---


## 注意事項

- このプラグインは選択画像の内容を外部AIサービス（Google Gemini/OpenAI）に送信します。プライバシーや機密情報の取り扱いにご注意ください。

- 生成されるaltテキストはAIによる自動生成のため、最終的な内容はご自身でご確認ください。


---


## English


### Overview

AI Alt Text Generator is a Figma plugin that uses Google Gemini or OpenAI Vision APIs to automatically generate accessible alt text for selected images in your Figma file.


### Features

- Generate alt text using **Gemini (Google) or OpenAI Vision API**

- **UI and prompt language switch (Japanese/English)** with a single button

- **API keys are securely saved** using Figma's clientStorage

- **Generate multiple candidates (1–5) at once, editable and selectable**

- **Keyword input** to influence the generated alt text

- **Image preview** and status display

- **Clear error feedback**


### Setup

1. Install the plugin in Figma

2. Obtain a [Google Gemini API key](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) or an [OpenAI API key](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)

3. Launch the plugin and enter/save your API key(s) in the Settings tab


### How to Use

1. **Select an image node on the Figma canvas**

2. In the "Generate Alt Text" tab, click the "Analyze Image" button

3. The image preview and size will be displayed

4. Optionally, enter keywords (comma-separated for English, "、" for Japanese) and select the number of candidates

5. Click the "Generate Alt Text" button

6. Candidate alt texts will be displayed, each editable

7. Copy the desired alt text and paste it into Figma's alt text field or elsewhere as needed


### Language Switch

- Use the "日本語 | English" button at the top right to instantly switch all UI and prompts between Japanese and English


### About API Keys

- Either Gemini or OpenAI API key is required (if both are entered, Gemini is prioritized)

- API keys are securely saved in Figma's clientStorage

- Please check each service's official documentation for free tier and usage limits


### Notes

- This plugin sends the selected image to external AI services (Google Gemini/OpenAI) for analysis. Please be mindful of privacy and confidential information.

- The generated alt text is AI-generated; please review and edit as needed before use.
plugins.tagline: AI Alt Text Generatorは、Figma上で選択した画像に対してGoogle GeminiまたはOpenAIのAIを使い、アクセシブルな代替テキスト（altテキスト）を自動生成します。

132361.name: AI Alt Text Generator
132361.description:
# Figma Plugin: AI Alt Text Generator


AI Alt Text Generatorは、Figma上で選択した画像に対してGoogle GeminiまたはOpenAIのAIを使い、アクセシブルな代替テキスト（altテキスト）を自動生成するFigmaプラグインです。


---


## 機能概要

- **Gemini（Google）またはOpenAI Vision API**を利用し、画像内容に応じたaltテキストを自動生成

- **日本語・英語のUI/プロンプト切り替え**（画面右上のボタンで即時反映）

- **APIキーはFigmaのclientStorageに安全に保存**

- **複数候補（1～5件）を一度に生成し、編集・選択可能**

- **キーワード指定**で生成内容をカスタマイズ

- **画像プレビュー**とステータス表示

- **エラー時の明確なフィードバック**


---


## セットアップ

1. プラグインをFigmaにインストールします。

2. [Google Gemini APIキー](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) または [OpenAI APIキー](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys) を取得します。

3. プラグインを起動し、設定タブでAPIキーを入力・保存してください。


---


## 使い方

1. **Figmaキャンバス上で画像ノードを選択**

2. 「Altテキスト生成」タブで「画像を解析」ボタンをクリック

3. 画像プレビューとサイズが表示されます

4. 必要に応じてキーワード（日本語は読点「、」区切り、英語はカンマ区切り）や候補数を指定

5. 「代替テキストを生成する」ボタンをクリック

6. 候補リストが表示され、各候補は編集可能

7. 必要に応じて内容をコピーし、プロジェクトの代替テキスト欄等に貼り付けてご利用ください


---


## 言語切り替え

- 画面右上の「日本語 | English」ボタンでUI・プロンプト・説明文が即座に切り替わります。


---


## APIキーについて

- GeminiまたはOpenAIのAPIキーが必要です（どちらか一方でも可。両方入力時はGeminiが優先されます）

- APIキーはFigmaのclientStorageに安全に保存されます

- 無料枠や利用制限については各サービスの公式情報をご確認ください


---


## 注意事項

- このプラグインは選択画像の内容を外部AIサービス（Google Gemini/OpenAI）に送信します。プライバシーや機密情報の取り扱いにご注意ください。

- 生成されるaltテキストはAIによる自動生成のため、最終的な内容はご自身でご確認ください。


---


## English


### Overview

AI Alt Text Generator is a Figma plugin that uses Google Gemini or OpenAI Vision APIs to automatically generate accessible alt text for selected images in your Figma file.


### Features

- Generate alt text using **Gemini (Google) or OpenAI Vision API**

- **UI and prompt language switch (Japanese/English)** with a single button

- **API keys are securely saved** using Figma's clientStorage

- **Generate multiple candidates (1–5) at once, editable and selectable**

- **Keyword input** to influence the generated alt text

- **Image preview** and status display

- **Clear error feedback**


### Setup

1. Install the plugin in Figma

2. Obtain a [Google Gemini API key](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) or an [OpenAI API key](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)

3. Launch the plugin and enter/save your API key(s) in the Settings tab


### How to Use

1. **Select an image node on the Figma canvas**

2. In the "Generate Alt Text" tab, click the "Analyze Image" button

3. The image preview and size will be displayed

4. Optionally, enter keywords (comma-separated for English, "、" for Japanese) and select the number of candidates

5. Click the "Generate Alt Text" button

6. Candidate alt texts will be displayed, each editable

7. Copy the desired alt text and paste it into Figma's alt text field or elsewhere as needed


### Language Switch

- Use the "日本語 | English" button at the top right to instantly switch all UI and prompts between Japanese and English


### About API Keys

- Either Gemini or OpenAI API key is required (if both are entered, Gemini is prioritized)

- API keys are securely saved in Figma's clientStorage

- Please check each service's official documentation for free tier and usage limits


### Notes

- This plugin sends the selected image to external AI services (Google Gemini/OpenAI) for analysis. Please be mindful of privacy and confidential information.

- The generated alt text is AI-generated; please review and edit as needed before use.

plugins.name: Mode Match
plugins.description:
Mode Match lets you take a variable's value from one mode and apply it to other modes. Match a single variable, group of variables, or all variables in a collection!


  1. Select your multi-mode collection
  2. Select the source mode (copy from)
  3. Select the destination mode (copy to)
  4. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  5. Update ✨


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering a path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input


Plugin Notes

  1. Collection list will only show collections with more than 1 mode
  2. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  3. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Supports

  1. All variable types (number, string, boolean, color)
  2. Aliasing
  3. Raw values


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Match variable values across modes.

plugins.name: not a status
plugins.description:
Плагин для управления статусами и задачами в макетах Figma. Разработан для оптимизации рабочего процесса.

Основные возможности:

  1. Быстрое управление статусами макетов: "В процессе", "На проверку", "Не актуально", "Готово"
  2. Привязка номеров задач к макетам с автоматическим созданием кликабельных ссылок
  3. Конвертация номеров задач [...] из названия фрейма в интерактивные ссылки
  4. Настраиваемый URL-шаблон для задач
  5. Поддержка статуса "Как на проде" для готовых макетов, сверенных с продом
  6. Автоматическое создание и обновление метаданных фрейма

Как использовать:

  1. Выберите фрейм
  2. Установите нужный статус
  3. Добавьте номера связанных задач
  4. Готово! Плагин автоматически создаст метаданные и настроит все связи

Для кого:

  1. Дизайнеры
  2. Разработчики
  3. Менеджеры проектов
  4. Команды, использующие Figma в рабочем процессе

Особенности:

  1. Интуитивно понятный интерфейс
  2. Быстрый доступ к часто используемым функциям
  3. Автоматическое сохранение настроек
  4. Поддержка горячих клавиш
plugins.tagline: 🚀 Простой способ связать макеты с задачами и управлять их статусами.

plugins.name: QuickToken
plugins.description:
QuickToken is the Figma plugin that enables instant variable import and seamless organization. Designed for designers who prioritize efficiency, QuickToken allows you to quickly insert variables into Figma’s local variables as design tokens. It supports collections and groups, keeping all variables clear and organized. Simplify your variable management and speed up your workflow with this powerful, efficient plugin!


Supported name schemes:


Create Variable Collection

#Collection


Create Variable Group

Group/


Create Variable

variable-name: value


The variable type recognition is automatically

based on the variable value itself.


Supported variable types


  1. Float 30
  2. Colors #333, #334455, rgb(0,100,100), rgba(2,2,2,0.1)
  3. Boolean: true, false
  4. String: 'Hello'
  5. Variable link: var(variable-name)
